title: Cognitive sucht serious Diamant Top laner
body:
Hi Guys I'm the captain for Team Cognitive who are playing in the Amatuer Conquerer Series which is an LCS style tournament with prize money.

Our team is looking for Top for the upcoming league matches and we have lost our players due to internet issues and inactivity.

We are looking for a committed diamond+ player who is free Saturdays and Sunday from 1800cet - 2200 cet.

We are looking for someone who is committed to improving themselves on league of legends, who are committed to playing with one team and who are okay with being coached and under a certain regiment as we are quite a serious team.

We are also looking to prepare for LAN tournaments in central Europe the upcoming months as well as for season 9. In season 9 we would like to qualify for ESL div 2 in Germany, So coming from Germany, Austria, Switzerland or Liechtenstein is a plus, but not necessary.

If something like this is of interest to you, please Message COG Clown on the League Client where we will go into more detail if needs be.

Thanks
